Hero.Title: Share information with tenants like you.
Hero.Body: We are a community-driven platform that aims to elevate tenant voices and promote landlord accountability.

Icon-Section.Anon-Body: Share your rental experience with confidence.
Icon-Section.Sol-Body: Join fellow Tenants by creating an informed community.
Icon-Section.Trans-Body: Empower others to make decisions about housing.

Submit-Review.Sub-Heading: Please make sure all this information matches your Lease
Submit-Review.Rating: Please rate the following on a scale from 1 (worst) to 5 (best)
Submit-Review.Repair-Desc: Rate your landlord on the quality and timeliness of their repairs to your unit.
Submit-Review.Health-Desc: Rate your landlord on how they address health and safety concerns (eg, pest control, mold removal, etc.).
Submit-Review.Stability-Desc: Rate your landlord on how they handle fees and rental increase law.
Submit-Review.Privacy-Desc: Rate your landlord on the level of privacy they give you in your unit (e.g., giving the legal 24 hour notice before entering).
Submit-Review.Respect-Desc: Rate your landlord on the level of respect and dignity you experience in your communication.
